text: That's kind. I bought the Adidas sweatshirt here.
title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Nice staff and everything was very tidy.", "Great range, well organized and sorted. Offers are also very good. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. The staff is extremely helpful and arranges missing sizes on an ad hoc basis. In fact, there is quite a bit of discounted stuff here.', 'As with the last visits, thanks to Adidas for the opportunity to park/spend the night here with your motorhome. Of course our son also found one or two things in your store!', 'Super nice Adidas outlet store. You can always get a bargain here. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

There is a great selection in all areas. In my opinion the prices could be a little lower for a brand store at the headquarters!']

text: Disappointing, very expensive shoes. The store is huge, beautiful, lots of goods, but there are almost no worthwhile offers
title: Adidas Outlet Shopping Experience & Product Review
repr_docs: ['Good deal, but quite expensive...next door you can get the same shoes for half the price', 'The store is good if you want bargains but if you want high quality designed shoes the place is not recommended. Most of the time, clothes are offered here that were still trendy two years ago. You could see the store as a remaining stock ‚Ä¶', 'Very few goods, really disappointing for an Adidas Center, Check Sport next door had several Adidas goods in total. The 2 stars are for the nice employees at Adidas', "This outlet has a broad variety of sneakers and other sport equipment. It is very close to the highway, so you won't lose much time taking this turn. Regarding the prices, i could say that there are discounts, but not much. I guess its cheaper than in the local store, but yiu have to check it on your own. Good luck", 'Way too expensive. Shoes usually cost ‚Ç¨85 online and ‚Ç¨75 in the outlet... I prefer to order from home and save myself the journey. From an outlet I expect at least 50% discount on the regular market price and not a ridiculous discount of ‚Ä¶', 'Overall, you have to be a little ‚Äúlucky‚Äù if you want to get real bargains. On average the prices are really better than online. But you can sometimes get really good bargains when older models have to go. (Ex.: Current adidas Predator SG ‚Ä¶', "I don't know why they don't have the shoes and models that I find in Greece. But relatively good considering the prices.", "Everything is a bit confusing. Shoes in sizes over 44 are relatively rare. Average discount at 30%. Before shopping, check whether there is an additional discount voucher online. The coffee in the outlet store is very good. The walk across the street to McDonald's, where there is still a lot of plastic for food, is not worth it.", "An ordinary Adidas in Nuremberg. Adult items are 110 euros, children's shoes are 55 euros. There is an outlet nearby and these shoes are 30 euros, 10 euros. So, if you have a vehicle, you can go to the outlet anyway.", "Anyone who pays more elsewhere is their own fault. If you know someone on the staff, ask and they'll definitely take you along. Then there are special discounts and then the price is actually good. Otherwise I think Adidas is overpriced."]

text: Really cool to see the original Adidas store. I was hoping to see some interesting shoes that I might be kind of special to the location, but they only had the usual, and a more limited selection at that.
title: Adidas Outlet Shopping Experience & Product Review
repr_docs: ['Good deal, but quite expensive...next door you can get the same shoes for half the price', 'The store is good if you want bargains but if you want high quality designed shoes the place is not recommended. Most of the time, clothes are offered here that were still trendy two years ago. You could see the store as a remaining stock ‚Ä¶', 'Very few goods, really disappointing for an Adidas Center, Check Sport next door had several Adidas goods in total. The 2 stars are for the nice employees at Adidas', "This outlet has a broad variety of sneakers and other sport equipment. It is very close to the highway, so you won't lose much time taking this turn. Regarding the prices, i could say that there are discounts, but not much. I guess its cheaper than in the local store, but yiu have to check it on your own. Good luck", 'Way too expensive. Shoes usually cost ‚Ç¨85 online and ‚Ç¨75 in the outlet... I prefer to order from home and save myself the journey. From an outlet I expect at least 50% discount on the regular market price and not a ridiculous discount of ‚Ä¶', 'Overall, you have to be a little ‚Äúlucky‚Äù if you want to get real bargains. On average the prices are really better than online. But you can sometimes get really good bargains when older models have to go. (Ex.: Current adidas Predator SG ‚Ä¶', "I don't know why they don't have the shoes and models that I find in Greece. But relatively good considering the prices.", "Everything is a bit confusing. Shoes in sizes over 44 are relatively rare. Average discount at 30%. Before shopping, check whether there is an additional discount voucher online. The coffee in the outlet store is very good. The walk across the street to McDonald's, where there is still a lot of plastic for food, is not worth it.", "An ordinary Adidas in Nuremberg. Adult items are 110 euros, children's shoes are 55 euros. There is an outlet nearby and these shoes are 30 euros, 10 euros. So, if you have a vehicle, you can go to the outlet anyway.", "Anyone who pays more elsewhere is their own fault. If you know someone on the staff, ask and they'll definitely take you along. Then there are special discounts and then the price is actually good. Otherwise I think Adidas is overpriced."]

text: Great Adidas store. I really enjoy shopping there. Very friendly service from the staff.
title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Nice staff and everything was very tidy.", "Great range, well organized and sorted. Offers are also very good. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. The staff is extremely helpful and arranges missing sizes on an ad hoc basis. In fact, there is quite a bit of discounted stuff here.', 'As with the last visits, thanks to Adidas for the opportunity to park/spend the night here with your motorhome. Of course our son also found one or two things in your store!', 'Super nice Adidas outlet store. You can always get a bargain here. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

There is a great selection in all areas. In my opinion the prices could be a little lower for a brand store at the headquarters!']

title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. Of course our son also found one or two things in your store!', 'Super nice Adidas outlet store. You can always get a bargain here. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

There is a great selection in all areas. In my opinion the prices could be a little lower for a brand store at the headquarters!']

text: You can sometimes get great bargains here. But where I prefer to go is the Adidas/Reebock sale. You can find real price hits here!
title: Adidas Outlet Shopping Experience & Product Review
repr_docs: ['Good deal, but quite expensive...next door you can get the same shoes for half the price', 'The store is good if you want bargains but if you want high quality designed shoes the place is not recommended. Most of the time, clothes are offered here that were still trendy two years ago. You could see the store as a remaining stock ‚Ä¶', 'Very few goods, really disappointing for an Adidas Center, Check Sport next door had several Adidas goods in total. The 2 stars are for the nice employees at Adidas', "This outlet has a broad variety of sneakers and other sport equipment. It is very close to the highway, so you won't lose much time taking this turn. Regarding the prices, i could say that there are discounts, but not much. I guess its cheaper than in the local store, but yiu have to check it on your own. Good luck", 'Way too expensive. Shoes usually cost ‚Ç¨85 online and ‚Ç¨75 in the outlet... I prefer to order from home and save myself the journey. From an outlet I expect at least 50% discount on the regular market price and not a ridiculous discount of ‚Ä¶', 'Overall, you have to be a little ‚Äúlucky‚Äù if you want to get real bargains. On average the prices are really better than online. But you can sometimes get really good bargains when older models have to go. (Ex.: Current adidas Predator SG ‚Ä¶', "I don't know why they don't have the shoes and models that I find in Greece. But relatively good considering the prices.", "Everything is a bit confusing. Shoes in sizes over 44 are relatively rare. Average discount at 30%. Before shopping, check whether there is an additional discount voucher online. The coffee in the outlet store is very good. The walk across the street to McDonald's, where there is still a lot of plastic for food, is not worth it.", "An ordinary Adidas in Nuremberg. Adult items are 110 euros, children's shoes are 55 euros. There is an outlet nearby and these shoes are 30 euros, 10 euros. So, if you have a vehicle, you can go to the outlet anyway.", "Anyone who pays more elsewhere is their own fault. If you know someone on the staff, ask and they'll definitely take you along. Then there are special discounts and then the price is actually good. Otherwise I think Adidas is overpriced."]

text: Great place to shop for Adidas and Rebook products. Definitely worth the drive all the way here to shop!
title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Nice staff and everything was very tidy.", "Great range, well organized and sorted. Offers are also very good. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. The staff is extremely helpful and arranges missing sizes on an ad hoc basis. In fact, there is quite a bit of discounted stuff here.', 'As with the last visits, thanks to Adidas for the opportunity to park/spend the night here with your motorhome. Of course our son also found one or two things in your store!', 'Super nice Adidas outlet store. You can always get a bargain here. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

There is a great selection in all areas. In my opinion the prices could be a little lower for a brand store at the headquarters!']

repr_docs: ['Good deal, but quite expensive...next door you can get the same shoes for half the price', 'The store is good if you want bargains but if you want high quality designed shoes the place is not recommended. Most of the time, clothes are offered here that were still trendy two years ago. You could see the store as a remaining stock ‚Ä¶', 'Very few goods, really disappointing for an Adidas Center, Check Sport next door had several Adidas goods in total. The 2 stars are for the nice employees at Adidas', "This outlet has a broad variety of sneakers and other sport equipment. It is very close to the highway, so you won't lose much time taking this turn. Regarding the prices, i could say that there are discounts, but not much. I guess its cheaper than in the local store, but yiu have to check it on your own. Good luck", 'Way too expensive. Shoes usually cost ‚Ç¨85 online and ‚Ç¨75 in the outlet... I prefer to order from home and save myself the journey. From an outlet I expect at least 50% discount on the regular market price and not a ridiculous discount of ‚Ä¶', 'Overall, you have to be a little ‚Äúlucky‚Äù if you want to get real bargains. On average the prices are really better than online. But you can sometimes get really good bargains when older models have to go. (Ex.: Current adidas Predator SG ‚Ä¶', "I don't know why they don't have the shoes and models that I find in Greece. But relatively good considering the prices.", "Everything is a bit confusing. Shoes in sizes over 44 are relatively rare. Average discount at 30%. Before shopping, check whether there is an additional discount voucher online. The coffee in the outlet store is very good. The walk across the street to McDonald's, where there is still a lot of plastic for food, is not worth it.", "An ordinary Adidas in Nuremberg. Adult items are 110 euros, children's shoes are 55 euros. There is an outlet nearby and these shoes are 30 euros, 10 euros. So, if you have a vehicle, you can go to the outlet anyway.", "Anyone who pays more elsewhere is their own fault. If you know someone on the staff, ask and they'll definitely take you along. Then there are special discounts and then the price is actually good. Otherwise I think Adidas is overpriced."]

text: Shopping day...Adidas was the first store in town visited, great selection, dedicated and friendly salespeople...that's how shopping is fun.
title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Nice staff and everything was very tidy.", "Great range, well organized and sorted. Offers are also very good. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. The staff is extremely helpful and arranges missing sizes on an ad hoc basis. In fact, there is quite a bit of discounted stuff here.', 'As with the last visits, thanks to Adidas for the opportunity to park/spend the night here with your motorhome. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

text: Good service. Nice shop. Still Adidas üòò ‚Ä¶
title: Positive Adidas Shopping Experience
repr_docs:
["Good selection, reasonable prices and advice from specialist staff works well. ADIDAS quality is undisputed anyway. It's always fun if you want to shop cheaply (not cheaply) üëçüëçüëç ‚Ä¶", '... you always find something. The friendliness and helpfulness of the Adidas employees is remarkable.
Great parking spaces - even for large SUVs!', "The Adidas Store is a must on any short vacation in the area. Huge selection at great prices and I find a great bargain almost every time. Very nice salesmen and saleswomen. Even if the parking garage and parking lot are full, it's all done ‚Ä¶", "We always like to stop at Adidas when we're passing through. Very large selection and always some bargains. The visit is definitely worth it. No long waiting times. However, we are always there first thing in the morning. Nice staff and everything was very tidy.", "Great range, well organized and sorted. Offers are also very good. Compared to the kitten named Pxxa, you just have to say, we've done our homework, we'll be happy to come back to the Adidas store.", 'Great Adidas store. The staff is extremely helpful and arranges missing sizes on an ad hoc basis. In fact, there is quite a bit of discounted stuff here.', 'As with the last visits, thanks to Adidas for the opportunity to park/spend the night here with your motorhome. Of course our son also found one or two things in your store!', 'Super nice Adidas outlet store. You can always get a bargain here. I always enjoy coming here', 'Had a nice time and bought something nice.

A great outlet center, just as we imagined Adidas would be. ‚Ä¶', 'We were passing through and also stopped at Adidas.

There is a great selection in all areas. In my opinion the prices could be a little lower for a brand store at the headquarters!']
